<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">SCHEDULE B &#151; CAPITAL CONTRIBUTION SCHEDULE
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">1.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Party A&#146;s Registered Capital Contributions</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party A&#146;s total contribution to the registered capital of the Company representing a
51% share in the registered capital of the Company shall be the amount of &#091;****&#093; million Renminbi (RMB
&#091;****&#093;).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party A shall make its contributions to the registered capital of the Company in accordance
with the following schedule:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Initial installment in the amount of &#091;****&#093; Renminbi (RMB &#091;****&#093;), or &#091;****&#093; percent (&#091;****&#093;%)
of Party A&#146;s total registered capital contribution to be made by Party A on or before the First
Capital Contribution Date.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subsequent installments of payments to be made in accordance with the Company&#146;s operational
requirements as determined by the Board, provided that in any event the full amount of Party A&#146;s
registered capital contributions shall be made in full no later than the Final Capital Contribution
Date.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subsequent installments of capital contribution by Party A can be made in cash or in kind. If
in kind, the value of the property shall be evaluated and certified by an independent auditor, who
shall be selected by the Parties from the pool of such auditors under the authorization by the
appropriate government agencies of the PRC.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">2.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Party B&#146;s Registered Capital Contributions .</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party B&#146;s total contribution to the registered capital of the Company representing a
25% share in the registered capital of the Company shall be the amount of &#091;****&#093; million Renminbi
(&#091;****&#093; RMB).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party B shall make its contributions to the registered capital of the Company in accordance
with the following schedule:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Initial installment in the amount of &#091;****&#093; RMB (&#091;****&#093; RMB), or &#091;****&#093; percent (&#091;****&#093;%) of
Party B&#146;s total registered capital contribution to be made by Party B on or before the First
Capital Contribution Date. Such contribution shall be made via wire transfer in United States
Dollar at the exchange rate as provided in the Contract.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subsequent installments to be made in accordance with the Company&#146;s operational requirements
as determined by the Board, provided that in any event the full amount of Party B&#146;s registered
capital contributions shall be made in full no later than the Final Capital Contribution Date.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subsequent installments of capital contribution by Party B can be made in cash or in kind. If
in kind, the value of the property shall be evaluated and certified by an independent auditor, who
shall be selected by the Parties from the pool of such auditors under the authorization by the
appropriate government agencies of the PRC.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

</DIV>

    <TD>Miscellaneous</TD>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">4.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>To the extent practicable, each Party shall make each of its initial and
subsequent registered capital contribution installments at the same time as the
corresponding installment to be made by the other Parties</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">4.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>With respect to the in-kind registered capital contributions (each an &#147;In-kind
Contribution Asset&#148;) to be made by a Party (&#147;Contributing Party&#148;) hereunder, such
Contributing Party hereby represents and warrants to the other Parties that as of the
date of the signing of this Contract, the Effective Date, the Business License Issuance
Date and the date of contribution of each such In-kind Contribution Asset:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Contributing Party possesses all rights, title and interest in
and to each such In-kind Contribution Asset;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>No In-kind Contribution Asset is jointly owned by or subject to any
Encumbrance in favor of or claim of any third party, and</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If in-kind contribution is land or land use rights, the Contributing
Party shall provide sufficient legal approval of its right over the land, the
duration of the assigned granted land use rights, compliance by the Contributing
Party with the terms of the underlying land grant contract, whether the land grant
premium and land price have been paid in full, whether the land has any
contamination or other environmental issues etc.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>Exhibit&nbsp;10.27</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>****TEXT OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY</B><BR>
C<B>ONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED<BR>
BY MESA AIR GROUP, INC.<BR>
UNDER 17C.F.R. SECTION 200.80(B)(4),<BR>
200.83 AND 240.24b-2</B><br><BR>
163872-3
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">THIRD AMENDMENT TO UNITED EXPRESS AGREEMENT

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment to the United Express Agreement (the <B>&#147;Amendment&#148;) </B>is effective as of August&nbsp;28,
2007 by and between <B>UNITED AIR LINES, INC., </B>a Delaware corporation, with its operations center
located at 1200 East Algonquin Road, Elk Grove Township, Illinois 60007 <B>(&#147;United&#148;), </B>and <B>MESA AIR
GROUP, INC., </B>a Nevada corporation, having its principal mailing address at 410 N 44<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">th</SUP>
St. Suite&nbsp;700, Phoenix, AZ 85008 <B>(&#147;Mesa&#148; </B>or &#147;<B>Contractor&#148;).</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>WHEREAS, </B>the parties previously entered into that certain Amended and Restated United Express<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">&#174;</SUP>
Agreement, dated as of January&nbsp;28, 2004 (United Contract # 163872) as amended on June&nbsp;3, 2005 (the
&#147;<B>First Amendment&#148;) </B>and March&nbsp;7, 2005 (the &#147;<B>Second Amendment&#148;) </B>(collectively, the &#147;<B>Agreement&#148;); </B>and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>WHEREAS, </B>pursuant to Article&nbsp;XXXI of the Agreement, the parties may modify or amend the
Agreement; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>WHEREAS, </B>Appendix&nbsp;A provides for the schedule of a Fleet Plan; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>WHEREAS, </B>the parties desire to further amend the Agreement to provide for the temporary and
permanent reductions of RJ-50 aircraft by Contractor in accordance with the Fleet Plan set forth on
Appendix&nbsp;A; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>WHEREAS, </B>pursuant to Section&nbsp;IV of the First Amendment, the parties desire to amend
notification requirements of Replacement RJ-70s.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>NOW THEREFORE, </B>for good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are
hereby acknowledged, the parties hereby agree as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">I. DEFINITIONS
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;<U>Defined Terms</U>. Capitalized terms used in this Amendment and not otherwise defined
in this Amendment shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;<U>Other Terms</U>. The following terms used in this Amendment shall have the
meanings given to them in this Section&nbsp;LB.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Per Aircraft Funding Requirement&#148; means the calculated rate of $&#091;****&#093; dollars per aircraft,
paid by Contractor to United as a funding requirement specified in Section&nbsp;XI of the First
Amendment. $&#091;****&#093; dollars equals the $&#091;****&#093; million funding requirement divided by &#091;****&#093;
Expansion Aircraft.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">II. SCOPE, TERM, and CONDITIONS
</DIV>

<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 3pt">
<B>**** Confidential Treatment Requested</B>
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;Attachment A to this Amendment is the revised iteration of Appendix&nbsp;A to the Agreement
(Fleet Plan) and is modified to include details and explanations of temporary and permanent
reductions to aircraft in fleet.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;In addition to the explanation given on Attachment A, notation 4, this Article&nbsp;II.B further
details the agreement by Contractor and United to permanently remove two (2)&nbsp;Expansion RJ-50
aircraft effective June&nbsp;7, 2007. United will pay Contractor &#091;****&#093; of the remaining unamortized Per
Aircraft Funding Requirement payment made to United. The unamortized portion of the Per Aircraft
Funding Requirement will be calculated from the month the two (2)&nbsp;Expansion RJ-50 aircraft are
permanently removed as specified in Attachment A.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#062;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The amount of this unamortized Per Aircraft Funding requirement is agreed to
be $&#091;****&#093; per aircraft or $&#091;****&#093; total. This $&#091;****&#093; payment will be made from
United to Mesa as previously agreed to as a series of monthly payments for the period
of &#091;****&#093; through &#091;****&#093;, totaling $&#091;****&#093;. United would increase Mesa&#146;s monthly
pre-payment by $&#091;****&#093; / &#091;****&#093; = $&#091;****&#093; total or $&#091;****&#093; per aircraft for the months
of &#091;****&#093; through &#091;****&#093;.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#062;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>United would make a 1-time catch up payment in the month following Amendment
execution for the prior months.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.&nbsp;United has agreed to permit Contractor to give United less than 180&nbsp;days notice of (2)
Replacement RJ-70s delivery dates as the aircraft were delivered in June&nbsp;2007.
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">III MISCELLANEOUS. Except as otherwise amended herein, the Agreement will remain in full force and
effect. The terms of this Amendment are deemed to be incorporated in, and made a part of, the
Agreement. This Amendment may be executed in any number of counterparts, by original or facsimile
signature, each of which when executed and delivered shall be deemed an original and such
counterparts together shall constitute one and the same instrument.
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&#091;Signature Page Follows&#093;

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><DIV align="left"><DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 13pt; width: 18%; border-bottom: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>**** Confidential Treatment Requested</B>
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->- 2 -<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

Amendment to be entered into and signed as of the day and year first above written.

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>Explanation of Change in Fleet</B>
</DIV>



<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">
<TR>
    <TD width="3%"></TD>
    <TD width="1%"></TD>
    <TD width="96"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">(1)</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>May&nbsp;1, &#145;07 Exchange 2 ERJs for 2 CRJs as part of plan to phase-out Expansion ERJs and replace
with Expansion CRJs.</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="font-size: 3pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">(2)</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Jun 1, &#145;07 Add 2 Replacement CR7s in compliance with original contract term.</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="font-size: 3pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">(3)</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Jun 7, &#145;07 Remove 2 Current CRJs, which were replaced by 2 CR7s on June&nbsp;1, 2007 in compliance
with original contract term.</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="font-size: 3pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">(4)</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Jun 7, &#145;07 Remove 2 Expansion CRJs permanently.</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="font-size: 3pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">(5)</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Jun 7, &#145;07 For the June&nbsp;2007 schedule, temporarily remove 1 CRJ for crew hour shortages.
Reduction reflected as 0.5 Current CRJ and 0.5 Expansion CRJ.</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="font-size: 3pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">(6)</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Jul 4, &#145;07 For the July&nbsp;2007 schedule, temporarily remove 2 CRJ for crew hour shortages.
Reduction reflected as 0.5 Current CRJ and 0.5 Expansion CRJ in addition to keeping removal of
June reduction of 0.5 Current CRJ and 0.5 Expansion CRJ.</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="font-size: 3pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">(7)</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Jul 4, &#145;07 Remove 1 ERJ as part of plan to phase-out Expansion ERJs (exchanged CRJ to be
delivered September&nbsp;5, 2007)</TD>
</TR>

<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>Exhibit&nbsp;10.28</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>****TEXT OMITTED AND FILED SEPARATELY<BR>
CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED<BR>
BY MESA AIR GROUP, INC.<BR>
UNDER 17C.F.R. SECTION 200.80(B)(4),<BR>
200.83 AND 240.24b-2</B><br><BR>
163872-4
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">FOURTH AMENDMENT TO UNITED EXPRESS AGREEMENT

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment to the United Express Agreement (the <B>&#147;Amendment&#148;) </B>is effective as of August&nbsp;28,
2007 by and between <B>UNITED AIR LINES, INC., </B>a Delaware corporation, with its operations center
located at 1200 East Algonquin Road, Elk Grove Township, Illinois 60007 <B>(&#147;United&#148;), </B>and <B>MESA AIR
GROUP, INC., </B>a Nevada corporation, having its principal mailing address at 410 N 44<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">th</SUP>
St. Suite&nbsp;700, Phoenix, AZ 85008 <B>(&#147;Mesa&#148; </B>or <B>&#147;Contractor&#148;).</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>WHEREAS, </B>the parties previously entered into that certain Amended and Restated United Express<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">&#174;</SUP>
Agreement, dated as of January&nbsp;28, 2004 (United Contract # 163872) as amended on June&nbsp;3, 2005 (the
<B>&#147;First Amendment&#148;), </B>March&nbsp;7, 2005 (the <B>&#147;Second Amendment&#148;, </B>and August&nbsp;28, 2007 (the <B>&#147;Third
Amendment&#148;) </B>(collectively, the <B>&#147;Agreement&#148;); </B>and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>WHEREAS, </B>pursuant to Article&nbsp;XXXI of the Agreement, the parties may modify or amend the
Agreement; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>WHEREAS, </B>Appendix&nbsp;A provides for the schedule of a Fleet Plan; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>WHEREAS, </B>the parties desire to further amend the Agreement to provide for the permanent
reductions of RJ-50 aircraft by Contractor in accordance with the Fleet Plan set forth on Appendix
A; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>WHEREAS, </B>the parties desire to further amend the Agreement to provide for the increase of
RJ-70 aircraft by Contractor in accordance with the Fleet Plan set forth on Appendix&nbsp;A; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>NOW THEREFORE, </B>for good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are
hereby acknowledged, the parties hereby agree as follows:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">I. DEFINITIONS
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;<U>Defined Terms</U>. Capitalized terms used in this Amendment and not otherwise defined
in this Amendment shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">II. SCOPE, TERM, and CONDITIONS
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;Attachment A to this Amendment is the revised iteration of Appendix&nbsp;A to the
Agreement (Fleet Plan) and is modified to include details and explanations of permanent
reductions and increases to aircraft in fleet.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;In addition to the explanation given on Attachment A, this Article&nbsp;II.B further
documents the agreement by Contractor and United to permanently remove eight (8)
Expansion RJ-50 aircraft effective on the dates specified in Attachment A to this
Amendment.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><DIV align="left"><DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 13pt; width: 18%; border-bottom: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 3pt"><B>**** Confidential Treatment Requested</B>
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.&nbsp;In addition to the explanation given on Attachment A, this Article&nbsp;II.C further documents
the agreement by Contractor and United to increase two (2)&nbsp;RJ-70 aircraft effective on the dates
specified in Attachment A to this Amendment.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="5%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">i.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The actual monthly aircraft ownership cost of these (2)&nbsp;RJ-70
aircraft will not exceed $&#091;****&#093; each. All other rates are the same as
specified in the Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">ii.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>These (2)&nbsp;RJ-70 aircraft will have a term of ten years from the
delivery date. These aircraft will be removed April&nbsp;22, 2018 and June&nbsp;3, 2018.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">iii.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>These (2)&nbsp;RJ-70 aircraft will be delivered and ready to enter
the United Express schedule on April&nbsp;23, 2008 and June&nbsp;4, 2008 in accordance
with United&#146;s Decor 5.5 livery specifications. These aircraft will be subject
to United&#146;s inspection to assure compliance with United&#146;s Decor 5.5
specifications before acceptance.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">III. MISCELLANEOUS. Except as otherwise amended herein, the Agreement will remain in full force
and effect. The terms of this Amendment are deemed to be incorporated in, and made a part of, the
Agreement. This Amendment may be executed in any number of counterparts, by original or facsimile
signature, each of which when executed and delivered shall be deemed an original and such
counterparts together shall constitute one and the same instrument.
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&#091;Signature Page Follows&#093;

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><DIV align="left"><DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 13pt; width: 18%; border-bottom: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 3pt"><B>**** Confidential Treatment Requested</B>
</DIV>

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have by their duly authorized officers caused this
Amendment to be entered into and signed as of the day and year first above written.

</DIV>

Third Amendment, Change #14: Add 1 Expansion CRJ to replace 1 Expansion ERJ removed on Aug 4, 2007
Fourth Amendment: Remove one Expansion CRJ.

</DIV>

each year thereafter during the term of the Original Agreement (as amended hereby), the Company
shall contribute $50,000 for the benefit of Executive under a Deferred Compensation Plan mutually
acceptable to Executive and the Company.&#148;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4 of the Original Employment Agreement is hereby amended to change the term &#147;Vice
President&#148; to &#147;Executive Vice President.&#148;
</DIV>

shall remain in full force and effect.

<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>Exhibit&nbsp;23.1</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">We consent to the incorporation by reference in Registration Statement Nos. 333-02791, 333-09395,
333-83799, 333-83801, 333-83803, 333-83805, 333-58646, 333-107404, and 333-125604 of Mesa Air
Group, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form S-8 and Registration Statement Nos. 333-108490, 333-115312, and
333-137382 on Form S-3 of our report dated January&nbsp;14, 2008 relating to the financial statements
(which report expresses an unqualified opinion and includes an explanatory paragraph relating to
the Company&#146;s adoption of Statement of Financial Accounting Standards No.&nbsp;123R, <I>Share-Based
Payment</I>, an explanatory paragraph related to discontinued operations, an explanatory paragraph
relating to the Company&#146;s significant code-sharing agreements, and an explanatory paragraph
relating to a judgment against the Company in a lawsuit) of Mesa Air Group, Inc., and of our report
dated January&nbsp;14, 2008 relating to the Company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting (which
report expresses an adverse opinion because of a material weakness), appearing in the Annual Report
on Form 10-K of Mesa Air Group, Inc. for the year ended September&nbsp;30, 2007.
</DIV>



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">/s/ DELOITTE &amp; TOUCHE LLP
</div>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Phoenix, Arizona<BR>
January&nbsp;14, 2008

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">I, Jonathan G. Ornstein, certify that:
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">1)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Mesa Air Group, Inc.;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">2)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact
or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the
circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period
covered by this report;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">3)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Based on my knowledge, the financial statements and other financial information included in
this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of
operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this
report;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">4)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and
maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and
15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules
13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls
and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information
relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by
others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being
prepared;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal
control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide
reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation
of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted
accounting principals;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls
and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such
evaluation; and</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">d)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting that occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the
registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially
affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s internal control
over financial reporting; and</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

functions):</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">a)</TD>

have a significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.</TD>

<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>Exhibit&nbsp;32.1</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>MESA AIR GROUP, INC. AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES<BR>
CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO<BR>
18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350,<BR>
AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO<BR>
SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">In connection with the Annual Report of Mesa Air Group, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form 10-K for the
period ended September&nbsp;30, 2007, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date
hereof (the &#147;Report&#148;), I, Jonathan G. Ornstein, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of the
Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the
Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(1)&nbsp;The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(2)&nbsp;The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the
financial condition and result of operations of the Company.
</DIV>

<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>Exhibit&nbsp;32.2</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>MESA AIR GROUP, INC. AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES<BR>
CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO<BR>
18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350,<BR>
AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO<BR>
SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">In connection with the Annual Report of Mesa Air Group, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form 10-K for the
period ended September&nbsp;30, 2007, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date
hereof (the &#147;Report&#148;), I, Michael J. Lotz, President, Chief Operating Officer, Principal Financial
and Accounting Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. 1350, as adopted pursuant to
Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(1)&nbsp;The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(2)&nbsp;The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the
financial condition and result of operations of the Company.
</DIV>
